name: XWUI Backdrop Component
description: Overlay backdrop component for modals, dialogs, and drawers. Provides a semi-transparent overlay that can be clicked to dismiss content.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

invisible.description: Whether the backdrop is transparent (invisible but still blocks interaction)

onClick.description: Click handler function (set programmatically, not via JSON)

zIndex.description: CSS z-index value for the backdrop

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component
